metadata.title: CVE-2021-38578 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
Existing CommBuffer checks in SmmEntryPoint will not catch underflow whencomputing BufferSize.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-38578` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ovmf - 2022.02-3ubuntu0.22.04.3
ovmf-ia32 - 2022.02-3ubuntu0.22.04.3
qemu-efi - 2022.02-3ubuntu0.22.04.3
qemu-efi-aarch64 - 2022.02-3ubuntu0.22.04.3
qemu-efi-arm - 2022.02-3ubuntu0.22.04.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: edk2 package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2022.02-3ubuntu0.22.04.3').
